entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 early this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CDT Friday 21 April 2023
